name: Puddle Boat
description:
Humankind has sunk. Krakens surfaced from the depth of the sea. Kill as many as possible before it is too late, Puddle Boat!

How to Play:

Shoot canon balls and bounce them on anything to kill as many Kraken as possible. The game is turn-based, everything moves when you do! Krakens at the bottom of the level will damage your health.

Controls:

WASD - Move.
IJKL or ARROW KEYS - Shoot.

Credits:
